thread.title: EU Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker: If Trump Promotes Brexit, We'll Break Up USA
thread.title_full: EU Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker: If Trump Promotes Brexit, We'll Break Up USA

title: EU Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker: If Trump Promotes Brexit, We'll Break Up USA
text:
EU Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker: If Trump Promotes Brexit, We'll Break Up USA | Posted By Tim Hains On Date March 30, 2017 
In an extraordinary speech Thursday morning, the EU Commission president said he would push for Ohio and Texas to split from the rest of the United States of America if the Republican president does not change his tune and become more supportive of the EU. He said: "Brexit isnât the end. A lot of people would like it that way, even people on another continent where the newly elected US President was happy that the Brexit was taking place and has asked other countries to do the same. If he goes on like that I am going to promote the independence of Ohio and Austin, Texas in the US."
